system.availability: Can vary depending on climate, from Tent Liners, Heating Bricks, Sunscreen, Extra Blankets, insect repellent, heavy gloves, greatcoats, parkers, filtration plugs, rad pills ,etc.
system.cost:
Part of the Standard Kit of all Guardsmen. Total Weight: ~32kg, Total Cost: 185 Thrones.
